text: 'inn khalq allah leysa min ghyr 'ab mthaluh kamathal khalaq allah liadam min ghyr 'ab wala am, 'iidh khalaqah min turab alard, thuma qal lh: "kn bshrana" fkan. fdewa 'ilhyt eisaa lkwnh khalaq min ghyr 'ab daewaa batlt; fadm ealayh alslam khalaq min ghyr 'ab wala am, watfq aljamie ealaa 'anah eabd min eibad allh
